name: Chrystal Reynolds
review: George attends to all my photographic inquiries so well. I have been a Michaels Camera purchaser for 30 years and still say that the service is better than ever. Thank you

name: Dunn Schmidt
review: I very much appreciated the expertise and knowledge of the staff concerning the camera I selected and the cheerful and patient way they shared their knowledge with me.

name: Juliet Hooper
review: Knowledge of the product range friendly service gave me some alternatives and not pushy

name: Laverne Barton
review: The service centre staff have always been very helpful and especially the Company were excellent in resolving any issues for me. Many thanks.

name: Reilly Stout
review: Sales staff spent time explaining the camera and he did not think that any question we asked was silly.

name: Chang Sanchez
review: As a newcomer to SLR cameras he advised me on what I should consider. We are very happy with our purchase.
